classes.lab4.console_reader package¶

Submodules¶

classes.lab4.console_reader.data_from_console module¶

Module: console_input_handler

This module provides functions for handling user input from the console.

Dependencies:

  • termcolor

  • curses

  • shared.input_handler

classes.lab4.console_reader.data_from_console.check_size(size)[source]¶

Check if the size is valid.

Args:

size (int): The size entered by the user.

Returns:

int: The valid size.

classes.lab4.console_reader.data_from_console.check_width_and_height(width, height)[source]¶

Check if the width and height are valid.

Args:

width (int): The width entered by the user. height (int): The height entered by the user.

Returns:

tuple: A tuple containing the valid width and height.

Returns:

str: The color entered by the user.
